title: Caesar! [2005] BBC radio drama [ogg] [radioCat]
description:
Caesar!

Six of Nine plays by Mike Walker based on &#039;Lives of the Twelve Caesars&#039; by Roman historian Suetonius (~69AD to ~130AD) [http://www.gutenberg.org/etext/6400]. Historical advisor: Tony O&#039;Connor, director: Stephen Canning, producer: Jeremy Mortimer. Originaly broadcast in 2003 and 2005.


1. Meeting at Formiae: Caesar makes an undercover visit to Cicero and Cato to gather support for his proposed rule of Rome. Starring David Troughton.

2. The Arena: As Julius Caesar&#039;s appointed heir, young Octavian needed all of his renowned political skill to outwit his enemies and rule Rome.

3. Peeling Figs For Julius: The story of Emperor Caligula, whose name has become a byword for depravity. Starring David Tennant.
  
4. The Best of Mothers: The story of Emperor Nero and his mother Agrippina whose influence eventually drives him to murder.

5. The Glass Ball Game: The story of Emperor Hadrian and his relationship with Antinous, who died in mysterious circumstances.

6. Citizens In A Great City: The story of Septimus Severus and how he ended up on the brink of becoming Emperor.

** MP3 release available from http://radioacrhive.cc **
